Section.Catchline: Disposition of individual after involuntary assessment.

SectionBody.Text: Based upon the involuntary assessment, a qualified professional of the hospital, detoxification facility, or addictions receiving facility, or a qualified professional when a less restrictive component has been used, must:

Subsection.Text: Release the individual and, where appropriate, refer the individual to another treatment facility or service provider, or to community services;
Allow the individual, with consent, to remain voluntarily at the licensed provider; or

Retain the individual when a petition for involuntary treatment has been initiated, the timely filing of which authorizes the service provider to retain physical custody of the individual pending further order of the court.

SectionBody.Text: Adhering to federal confidentiality regulations, notice of disposition must be provided to the petitioner and to the court.
